item.title: Dumped red car, 13th October
item.description:
This car appears to be abandoned on Melford rd - on corner of Underhill Road. . It is facing the wrong way on a one way street - it has a form on windscreen saying it has no tax. It now has a wheel clamp. It is blocking parking spaces so please can it be removed asap. It has been there for several weeks. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Underhill Road, East Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street lights out, 13th October
item.description:
There are 4 street lights out in Lee High Road. One by the BP petrol station, one by Zebra crossing near Boone Streer, one by bus stop near Dacre Park and one other. They are 4 in a row. It is dangerous to have that many not working.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 183-185, Lee High Road, Blackheath, London

item.title: No bins or recycling picked up for months!, 13th October
item.description:
The bins outside the estate haven’t been picked up in MONTHS, both food recycling and general recycling. We are left with the option of throwing them in general waste bins- overflowing those also! It’s wasteful, please have them collected more regularly :(
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Harrington Hill, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Felhampton Road, New Eltham, London
